NOTES:



IMAGiNE bringing you another release.......... Red Riding Hood 2011



Right the russian video was ok ,nothing too special but watchable.....but it did have a few issues.

Main one being the colouring was well whacked and also it had black borders on the right and top at

slight angles...oh and the worse thing was the interlace it was encoded into the film.

So we cropped the borders fixed the colouring the best we could with a white balance and rgb eq.....

we also hardcoded the one line on non english subs,we fixed the interlace issues and messed with the

brightness and contrast.

Audio was pretty decent,we just had to sync it and then mux it altogether :P



Enjoy folks :)
